abstract: Joe Drape On Horse Racing column notes that, despite having lost at Travers Stakes, Triple Crown-winner American Pharoah seems happy and healthy; holds that colt is well positioned to win upcoming Breeders' Cup Classic, which will be final race of his career.
lead_paragraph: Baffert said he was disappointed but satisfied with his colt’s gritty performance on Saturday and made it clear that he wanted him to race one last time, in the Breeders’ Cup Classic.

headline.main: After American Pharoah Is Dethroned, Baffert Has Plan to Cement His Place
headline.print_headline: After Colt Is Dethroned, Trainer Has Plan to Cement His Place

snippet: Baffert said he was disappointed but satisfied with his colt’s gritty performance on Saturday and made it clear that he wanted him to race one last time, in the Breeders’ Cup Classic.
